name: Planet 978X
description:
Made for the Kray8Games gamejam.

Story:

You are a delivery man. Your boss has asked you to go find some pie from planet 567B. Your ship has low fuel so you decide to go to a nearby planet known for its radioactive but extremely useful crystals, wich can be used as fuel for your ship.

Controls:

A & D to walk

SPACE to jump

Good luck!
